FuncDef: This command specifies the manually configured spoke-SDPs to be synchronized with the multi-chassis peer and a synchronization tag to be used while synchronizing these spoke-SDPs with the multi-chassis peer.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the SDP of the spoke-SDPs to be synchronized with the multi-chassis peer. Values-1 to 17407.
Specifies a synchronization tag, up to 32 characters in length, to be used when synchronizing with the multi-chassis peer.
